title: Five Steps Ahead
description: How do you stop a killer who is always five steps ahead?I had one job.One responsibility.Protect Hannah from the obsessed stalker who was determined to have her.When my sister went missing, I got even more distracted.Nothing could have prepared me for what was about to happen.I wasnâ€™t supposed to fall for the beautiful girl who was too young for me.But I did.And that one mistake almost cost us everything.
author: Samantha Baca
